黌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户盲切，平庚，匣。］
“横4”的被通假字。“黉1”的繁体字。
古代的学校。

黌字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【黃字部】　黌； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1517第22
【廣韻】戸盲切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】胡盲切，?音橫。【廣韻】學也。【後漢·儒林傳】順帝感翟酺之言，更修黌宇，凡所造搆二百四十房，千八百五十室，自是遊學增盛至三萬餘生。【蔡襄士伸知己賦】遠陶聖世，少齒鄕黌。○按史傳通作橫。互見木部橫字註。　又地名。【水經注】淶水北逕小黌東，又東逕大黌南，蓋霍原隱敎授之處也。徐廣云：雖千古世懸，猶表二黌之稱。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Yellow Word Department] 　黉; Kangxi strokes: 25; Page number: page 1517 22
[Guang Yun] Blind Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Hu blind cut,? The sound is horizontal. [Guang Yun] Learn also. [Post-Han · Ru Lin Biography] Emperor Shun felt Zhai Yao's words, and even repaired the Yu Yu. The two hundred and forty rooms, and the thousand and eight hundred and fifty rooms he built, he traveled to more than 30,000 students. [Cai Xiangshi Shen Zhiji Fu] Yuan Tao Shengshi, with few teeth and red hair. ○According to the historical biography. See Mube horizontal note.　Also place name. [Shui Jing Zhu] Laishui north leads to Xiaohongdong, and east to Dahongnan, where it is also taught by Huoyuan. Xu Guangyun: Although it has been hanging through the ages, it is still called the second school.
